name: aegispass
description: A stylish, secure local CLI password manager with AES-GCM encryption and scrypt hashing.

scripts.build:win: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/aegispass-win-x64.exe
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/aegispass-linux-x64
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/aegispass-macos-x64
scripts.build:pkg: npm run build:win && npm run build:linux && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:all: npm run build:pkg && npm run build:appimage

author: Sreeraj V Arjesh (@cyberkutti-iedc)
